etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Common Bulgarian word at A2 level. Useful for everyday communication
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Лекар' ≈ 'Arzt'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Der Arzt' е мъжки род; множествено 'die Ärzte'. Женска форма: 'die Ärztin'.
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation

notes: 'Болница' leitet sich von 'болен' (krank) ab und bezeichnet einen Ort für Kranke – wie das deutsche 'Krankenhaus'.
etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Common Bulgarian word at A2 level. Useful for everyday communication
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Болница' ≈ 'Krankenhaus'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Das Krankenhaus' е среден род; множествено 'die Krankenhäuser'. Израз: 'im Krankenhaus liegen'.
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Common Bulgarian word at A2 level. Useful for everyday communication
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Аптека' ≈ 'Apotheke'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Die Apotheke' е женски род. Немците казват 'zur Apotheke gehen', за да купят лекарства.
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Common Bulgarian word at A2 level. Useful for everyday communication
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Лекарства' ≈ 'Medikamente'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Die Medikamente' е множествено число на 'das Medikament'. Пример: 'Medikamente einnehmen' (вземам лекарства).
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Common Bulgarian word at A2 level. Useful for everyday communication
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Спешно' ≈ 'Notfall'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Der Notfall' е мъжки род и означава спешен случай. Израз: 'Im Notfall 112 anrufen'.
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Common Bulgarian word at A2 level. Useful for everyday communication
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Болка' ≈ 'Schmerz'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Der Schmerz' е мъжки род; множествено 'die Schmerzen'. Казваме 'Schmerzen haben' (имам болки).
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Common Bulgarian word at A2 level. Useful for everyday communication
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Здраве' ≈ 'Gesundheit'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Die Gesundheit' е женски род и означава здраве. Фраза: 'Auf Ihre Gesundheit!' при наздравица.
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Common Bulgarian word at A2 level. Useful for everyday communication
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Треска' ≈ 'Fieber'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Das Fieber' е неутрално; казва се 'Fieber haben' или 'hohes Fieber'.
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Common Bulgarian word at A2 level. Useful for everyday communication
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Настинка' ≈ 'Erkältung'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Die Erkältung' е женски род. Израз: 'eine starke Erkältung' или 'sich erkälten'.

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Common Bulgarian word at A2 level. Useful for everyday communication
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Помощ' ≈ 'Hilfe'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Die Hilfe' е женски род; казва се 'Hilfe rufen' (викам помощ) или 'Danke für die Hilfe'.
